algorithmDevelopment.description: Processes for developing new algorithms for learning and decision-making.

activeDevelopment.description: Actively develops new algorithms based on identified knowledge gaps or improvements.
activeDevelopment.trigger: identification of knowledge gap or potential improvement

passiveDevelopment.description: Passively refines existing algorithms based on ongoing operations and interactions.

shortTermStorage.description: Stores algorithms temporarily for immediate use in learning and decision-making.

longTermStorage.description: Stores algorithms permanently for future reference and learning.

algorithmProcessing.description: Processes raw algorithms into a format suitable for learning and decision-making.

featureExtraction.description: Identifies and extracts relevant features from preprocessed algorithms.

algorithmEvaluation.description: Evaluates the quality and effectiveness of algorithms for learning and decision-making.

effectivenessCheck.description: Checks the effectiveness of algorithms based on current knowledge base and goals.

qualityCheck.description: Checks the quality of algorithms based on predefined quality criteria.
